absences.name: absences
absences.description: Send your absences in private message.
absences.conditions: You need to be registered, see `/help register`

agenda.name: agenda
agenda.description: Send your schedule in private message.
agenda.conditions: You need to be registered, see `/help register`

grades.name: grades
grades.description: Send your grades in private message.
grades.conditions: You need to be registered, see `/help register`

register.name: register
register.description: Register you in order to retrieve datas from your myges account
register.conditions: Having a myges account ~~ Retrieve your schedule, your grades and your absences. ~~ Data are just retrieve from your account, store in the local machine to compare it with the old data and then display to you. No others applications with your data.

set-status.name: set-status
set-status.description: Set the status of the bot
set-status.conditions: Need to be the owner of the bot

set-up.name: set-up
set-up.description: Set the schedule channel, the reminder channel and the error channel used by the bot to provide informations
set-up.conditions: Need to be the owner of the bot
